title: League patch stopping
body:
Hi,
I have been trying to update my League to the latest patch. After 4 days of sitting around, deleting files
and re-installing the entire game, I've had NO success.
When i open the game, the patcher begins. It scans files, then get to step 2/2, and dies. At 33%, my KBps drops
drastically until it eventually reaches 0KBps.

Someone please help because this has been shitting me up the wall for days...

Cheers

replies.body:
Have you tried disconnecting and reconnecting your internet while it's at 0kbps?

Also, specifically at 33% sounds a bit suss. Are you sure that no error messages are appearing or anything?

33% is the percentage that step 2 begins at
I reformatted my computer yesterday and it's still having trouble, now it has got to 80% and dropped to 0KBps...

Thanks for helping though! :)

If there's no error messages coming up then constantly refreshing the connection should do the trick. At least, that's what I've found to work when downloading a big patch.

I'm not really familiar with the whole "steps" thing, only when it's either downloading, applying patches or scanning for files.
It ended up working after i left it there for a while, however it still said 0KBps, but the percentage only changed!

It only does that because the bar used to indicate the percent completed is... *slow* to react to what's actually happening.

Were you able to completely patch, though?
